sms_masteryPanel.buildInOverMaxWarning: Warning: building in additional S-mods will incur a DP penalty

sms_descriptions.reduceSModCreditsCost: Reduces the credits cost of building in hullmods by %s.
sms_descriptions.reduceSModCreditsCostNeg: Increases the credits cost of building in hullmods by %s.
sms_descriptions.reduceSModMPCost: Reduces the mastery point cost of building in hullmods by %s, down to a minimum of %s.
sms_descriptions.reduceSModMPCostNeg: Increases the mastery point cost of building in hullmods by %s.
sms_descriptions.reduceRestorationCost: Reduces the cost of restoring damaged ships by %s.
sms_descriptions.reduceRestorationCostNeg: Increases the cost of restoring damaged ships by %s.
sms_descriptions.enableSModRemoval: Grants the ability to clear S-mods from ships.
sms_descriptions.enableSModRemovalPost: All S-mods must be removed. Costs nothing and refunds nothing.
sms_descriptions.allowOverCapacitySModsSingle: Grants the ability to bypass the standard S-mod limit, enabling installation of an additional %s S-mod
sms_descriptions.allowOverCapacitySModsPlural: Grants the ability to bypass the standard S-mod limit, enabling installation of an additional %s S-mods.
sms_descriptions.allowOverCapacitySModsPost: DP is increased by %s for each installed S-mod past the normal limit, rounded up.

sms_misc.effectCantBeDeactivatedWarning: Warning: effect can't be deactivated once active
